comment: ****leans forward to caress the full length delivery moving away from him to left of mid-off for a single
around the off stump, on a length, Kallis gets close to the line of bull and pushes it out to the off side

**drama** Huge appeal for a catch behind but Russel Tiffin has turned it down. Lovely delivery, straightening from the good length, Kallis goes for the on-the-up off drive and the ball flies past the edge. Was there a nick? The replays don't confirm it. There was some itsy bitsy tiny noise on it. The appeal was unanimous but then these days that doesn't mean much.
leans forward to push the length delivery to the off side
shuffles across to push to mid-on for a single
fullish and around the legs, rolls of the pad
short in length and outside off stump, slashed away to third man
goes for the yorker, Manish takes his front leg out of the way and brings his bat down in a hurry. The ball flies off the inner half of the bat and rushes on this fast outfield to fine-leg boundary
length delivery around off , Manish stays beside the line to push it out to cover
stays on the leg stump line and has a flash at a back-of-length delivery outside off stump but makes no contact . the bat goes under the ball
jumps to get on top of the bounce of the short-of- length delivery coming in to the middle stump line and works it to the leg for a single
straightens around the middle stump line, Kallis was on the shuffle, adjusts his wrists to adjust to the straightening and pushes the ball to the on side of the pitch
The bouncer arrives and Manish top-edges the pull. But luckily, for him , the ball lands safely in short fine-leg region

** L Bala** doesn't see the ball at third man! Opportunity for **catch missed**. Kallis had backed away and charged out for the big lofted off drive and ended up slicing the ball towards third man. Bala came forward and completely lost sight of the ball. Could be the crowd. Hopefully not his eyes. The ball sails over him and lands inside the boundary ropes!
Ooh . this pitch has bounce and carry. It kicks up from short of length, Kallis is almost squared-up as the ball straightens and manages to stab it just past the diving slip fielder and it races away
in the zone outside off stump, left alone
charges out as he moves outside leg stump and tries to slash the bouncing short of length delivery but the ball bounces over the flashing blade.
fuller, around the off stump, hint of away movement, Kallis stays where he is this time and opens the bat-face to guide the ball to point
length delivery that moves in to off and middle, pushed out cautiously to the off side
backs away outside leg stump, Tyagi digs it in short and outside off, Manish tries to reach out but mistimes the intended cut and the ball rolls to cover
And again. Another mistimed cut and this time the ball rolls off the bottom of the bat to slip.
this one flies from short of length and Pandey again can't connect with the cut. Again, the bat went below the ball. Beaten by the extra bounce.
Tyagi cuts this one back into Manish, who is as ever looking to move outside leg at the last minute, and cramps him for room. Tucked to square-leg
threatens to move towards leg before he moves towards the off side and goes for the pull. But he too is unable to connect properly and the ball rolls towards mid-on. Good over.
goes for the slower one and Kallis leans forward to lift it over cover point.. Easily done. The full swing of the bat.
ball, The beamer arrives! So does the apology from the bowler. A startled Kallis just about manages to stab it away. The ball slips out at the release
length delivery around off stump, defended to the off side

**What a mess from Muralitharan!** Fielding lapse. Not a catch. Kallis shuffled outside off and whipped a full delivery from outside off to mid-on where Murali makes a fine mess. The ball went right through him.

is the first time that Kallis has got out in this IPL.. Stop the press. Call your grandfather. Tell your neighbor. Silence your dog. Kallis, again, shuffled right across, got outside off stump and tried to whip-flick a length delivery over the on-side field. Thin air. The ball flies through straight to crash into the middle stump.
Bala slips in a wide down the leg side
Big swing and a miss. It was wider outside off and Rahul went for the big off drive but couldn't reach
length delivery outside off and moving away slightly, Rahul tries to run it down to third man but can't connect.
**just over mid-on**. It was the short delivery around off stump, Manish goes for his flat-batted heave down the ground and just about clears mid-on
Top shot! Manish rocks back to get on top of the bounce of the short-of-length delivery outside off and cuts superbly to point boundary. A good horizontal-bat shot.
length delivery just outside off, Manish tries to force it through the off side and edges it to short fine-leg
fuller, on the middle, on driven to mid-on
full delivery again, Is Dravid expecting it to be short? He was caught hanging well inside the crease and lunges out but mistimes the straight drive
on the middle stump line, pushed to mid-on for a single
back of length, just outside off, run down to third man
shortish, in the zone outside off, Dravid goes for the cut but doesn't connect. He went too hard at that shot.
Bosh! Full in length and around off stump, Dravid leans forward to knife through the line and on the up and the ball flies over mid-off
**edged** past the diving Hayden at lone slip. It was a length delivery outside off, Dravid wanted to drive it over cover.. slightly slower in pace this one, and he edges it wide of Haydos
this time he leans across, gets close to the line of the ball outside off and opens the bat-face to guide it past Hayden
byes, pushes it to the pads, Manish plays the leg glance and it gets away past the diving fielder near the boundary
bye, Murali starts from round the stumps. Off break on the middle and leg line, tries to flick it and the ball rolls towards midwicket
on the middle stump line, worked to Suresh Raina at short straightish midwicket
spins down the leg side, past the attempted glance .. wide
quicker, on the middle stump line, length delivery, Manish pulls it to left of short midwicket where Raina makes a diving stop
on the off stump line, tapped to right of Raina and calls Dravid for a quick single
Top shot! . It wasn't all that short, Dravid rocked back, created his own length and punched the off break to wide long-on boundary.

super comeback from Murali! It was the topspinner this time. It landed on the middle and off stump line, from round the stumps, and moved towards off stump.. Rahul again rocked back and tried to cut it but misses it completely. Timber!
bounces from short of length outside off , dabbed to point

tries to clear the front foot and seemed to be initially going for the pull to the on side but the ball wasn't short as he anticipated. He tried to adjust by changing his shot and go for a cut but the ball flies past the edge

**run out missed** It was pushed to midwicket and Robin had backed up too far. Hayden picked up the ball and fired the throw at the non-striker's end. Robin tried to dive back in .. Had it hit the stumps, he would have been out
high bouncer flies over Pandey
kicks up from short of length outside off, Manish wrists it wide of Hayden at midwicket for a single
goes for the yorker, pushed out to cover
good delivery, straightening outside off stump, Robin is beaten, trying to guide it to third man. Fine spell from Tyagi, who replaced Gony for this match.
turns in to the off stump line, pushed back to the bowler
slows up the pace, off break on middle stump line, worked wide of midwicket
bye, appeal for lbw .. Robin goes for the big sweep and perhaps is struck just outside off stump. Got to see the replays.

strikes again. Manish went for the big slog sweep this time and ended up slicing it towards mid-on. The ball swirled down from the night sky .. Raina went back from short midwicket and took a good catch as the ball dropped behind his shoulder.
Robin goes for the reverse sweep, misses and is struck on the pad. Perhaps, turning down leg.
He repeats the reverse sweep and this time connects really well. The ball races past short third man fielder.
leans forward to push it away for a single
turns this towards mid-on .. and they rush back fo the second rub .. before the man rushes in from the deep. Superbly run by both
leans forward to ping long-on
length delivery but it kicks up appreciably and Robin pushes at it and is beaten.
leans across and tries to work it to the on side and gets a leading edge to third man
full length delivery outside off and Kohli plays a classy cover drive ... the ball races away through the off-side field
goes for the big slog sweep but it flies striaght to Raina at short midwicket

**dropped** by R Ashwin at deep cover. RObin had switched around completely into a left-hander's stance and plays a reverse sweep - a revere slog sweep! - but Ashwin and Tyagi nearly converge and Ashwin fails to hold on.. no one called for the catch I guess
goes for another reverse sweep! this time doesn't switch around completely .. and the ball goes past short third man
byes, the ball turns into the leg and middle line and rolls away to fine-leg region
another off break on the middle and leg line and Kohli plays a delightful glance shot .. working his wrists over time and the ball races away to fine-leg boundary
Whack! Quickish and short of length, Robin rocked back to pull it hard to the wide midwicket boundary
much fuller, swung straight to Raina at short midwicket
walks down the track and plays a paddle sweep from outside off stump! What is going off out there as Fred Trueman would have said!
low full toss, swatted away to long-on
hurls it really full, in search of the yorker, pushed past the non-striker
full and straight again, worked to right of Raina at midwicket
length delivery on off and middle line, pushed to left of straightish midwicket for a quick single
full in length and outside off, around 127 kmph, hit hard but straight to cover
walks down the track and forces the short-of-length delivery to long-on
short in length, cuts in to the middle stump line, Kohli mistimes the pull shot and the ball rolls towards deep midwicket
Big swing and a miss! Full and outside off stump, Robin wanted to thrash it over the bowler but no wood on leather

Top edged! Robin goes for the big pull and top edges it over the keeper. Murali runs across from third man and the ball threatens to spin away at the last minute but he stopped and lunged to his right to push it back to the field of play
low dipping full toss, hit straight to long-on
really full, Robin wants to go for the big hit but is unable to get under the ball and gets a single as it rolls to long-on
goes down on his knee to drive hard but again straight to long-on
full, very full, Robin is unable to get under the ball again.. pushed back to the bowler
bye, tries the reverse paddle this time and the ball rolls away to short cover region off the pad
moves outside leg and lifts it to long-off. Just a single. Fine tight over from Ash who has been bowling it really full, just short of the blockhole
**Parthiv misses a stumping chance**. Kohli goes down the track but is beaten in the flight and it goes between his bat and pad and just outside leg stump.. Patel fails to collect it cleanly.
Thwack! He rocked back, created room and pulled it hard over long-on. Up .. up and over.
tries to go for another pull but doesn't connect properly

time for Parthiv. Again, Murali beats Kohli in flight by the doosra and also by the shortening of the length, and the ball went past the attempted lofted slog .. this time it was outside off and hence lot more easier for Patel who did what was required of him
gets forward to drive straight to short cover
Another dot ball. Morgan tries to work it to the on side but edges it.
Thunderous Wallop! Robin clears the front foot and smokes the length delivery high over long-on .. way back into the stands.
**dropped by Vijay** at long-on. Robin whacked the full toss hard to Vijay who drops it! What a Clanger!
length delivery around off stump line, nudges it away for a single
full and outside off, Robin mistimes the off drive but will collect a single
in length and straight and Morgan goes for the good-old slog across the line and completely misses it. Timber!
short in length and outside off and Boucher cuts straight to backward point. Both batsmen meet for a chat.
walks down the track and whips it to deep midwicket.
gets forward to drive to Vijay at long-on
moves outside leg and drives the full dipping full toss to long-off
fires it really full and low, another dipping full toss, whipped to deep midwicket
The white ball has gone flying over midwicket boundary! Robin walked down the track, got the ball on full and swung it over the on-side
walks down the track, Ashwin pushes it further outside off and Robin swipes it across the line but doesn't connect properly.. just a single, wide of midwicket
Super shot! This time he stayed still at his original stance and unfurled a fine cover drive. The ball raced away to the boundary, Bailey threw in a dive at the boundary line but can't cut it offf
Will this ball come back from the midwicket stands?! Robin walked down the track, Bala hurled it short and slow, Robin adjusted, opened-up his stance and whacked it high over the boundary
Whadaaplayaaaaaaa! Third IPL flfty and in what style. He almost went down on his knee and smoked a length delivery high over long- on!

Hat trick of sixes. Robin has gone berserk with his violence and the crowd have gone mad! Flat-batted six over long-on! You beauty! Bala banged it short and Robin went for the fore-hand wallop! The ball almost cleared the stadium and it crashed against the roof of the top stand!
really full this time, driven to cover for a single
really full in length , square driven to sweeper cover.
full delivery, Boucher drills it hard but straight to long-off
gets forward to drive to long-on
Huge! Maximum! Boucher this time. He went down on his knee and proposed .. disposed it over long-on!
goes for the yorker length, dug out to midwicket
What a knock this from Robin Uthappa! Yet another violent hit over long-on. The carnage continues. He cleared the front foot and crashed it over long-on. Boom! Biff!
walks down the track and drags it from outside off to deep midwicket. He rushes back for the second and dives to get back inside the crease.
some swing there. Away from the left-handed Parthiv. It started from middle and leg and moved towards off and middle, defended to the off side
pushed towards mid-off for a quick single. . Robin rushed forward and fired in a throw at the non-striker's end .. had he hit, parthiv would have been struggling to get back inside the crease in time
in the channel outside off stump, Hayden allows it to pass through to Boucher

**run out of Hayden missed** Kohli is furious with himself. Hayden had walked down the track but missed the hit, the ball went off his thigh pad to the off side. Kohli rushed in from backward point and under-armed a throw but missed.
leans forward to drive to mid-off where Robin makes a tumbling stop
takes out Parthiv. He switched to round the stumps for this delivery and got the ball to curve away from Parthiv from that angle. Fine delivery. Parthiv had a lame poke at it. Fatal.
around 147 kmph, skids on quickly from short of length, jabbed away to the on side
bounces it short . but well outside off.. Hayden shoulders arms. It went inside the white wide line, called a wide, though
in the zone outside off, much closer this time and curving back .. left alone
151.8 kmph pacy full delivery but it has been smashed to left of mid-off. Hayden walked down the track and flayed the overpitched delivery
149.9 kmph, length delivery, kicks up outside off stump, left alone by Hayden
walks down the track and pushes it out to right of mid-off
full, fast - 150.3 kmph- but wide outside off stump. Kumble has a chat with the bowler
in the channel outside off stump, angling away from Hayden who lets it go through to Boucher
full and curving away, jabbed behind the wicket .. the ball rolls back
stays back to clip it behind square-leg for a single
It has disappeared over mid-off. Full, looking for swing, and Hayden leans forward quickly to lift it over mid-off. Change of bat for Hayden but not the mini mongoose.
length delivery on middle and off, pushed towards the non striker and PK intercepts
moves in from middle and leg, slower one, Hayden tries to clip it through the on side, misses and is hit on the thigh pad ..
fires across a bouncer .. too high .. Wide
slower one, short in length ,clipped past square-leg for couple of runs
full, pacy, lands on the middle and off line, 150.3 kmph, curves towards off , defended on the back foot
lands on a length outside off stump and curves away, 149.3 kmph, left alone
a pacy bouncer, 152.6 kmph!, Bailey just about manages to duck out of the way

fuller, good leg cutter at just over 150 kmph, jabbed out to cover for a quick single . the throw deflects off Bailey's bat as he grounds it in and goes wide of mid-on but Bailey says let's not run this overthrow. perhaps because it went off the bat. World Cup final - one extra run to win, won't he then take the overthrow?!
pushes this wide outside off stump,
around 147 kmph, short of length outside off, slashed to third man

He is beaten for pace here. Around 148 kmph length delivery skidding on quickly towards middle stump, Bailey wanted to work it to the on side but the ball whooshes past the bat and thuds into the thigh pad
on the middle stump line, worked behind square-leg .. Pk is there .. so no single
walks down the track and whips the dipping full toss to midwicket
full and skidding in, driven out to short cover
the slider arrives, Bailey pushes unconvincingly and it goes off the pad and BOucher collects very well
Bailey can't get Kumble away. Another slider on the middle stump line, pushed out to the on side
ANother dot ball! It skids on from the length, stabbed to the off side
Beaten by the slower one. Both Hayden and Kallis have a laugh about it. Hayden was going for the big swing but went through too early with the shot
works this one past square-leg for a single
outside off stump, run down to third man.
moves outside leg stump, Kallis follows him with a full length delivery, Hayden edges the intended big hit to the on side
Slap! Short in length and outside off and Bailey breaks free with a fierce square-cut
well directed bouncer, around 134 kmph, at the face, Bailey is late on the pull and just about manages to yank his head out of the way
almost a yorker on the middle, pushed back to Kumble
walks down the track, another yorker-length, squeezed out to midwicket.
on the middle stump line, Bailey jumps out to the leg side and cuts it for a single
on the leg and middle stump line, lifted towards long-on

**shout for a catch behind decision** Lovely skidding two-fingered googly on the middle stump line. .. Bailey is completely cramped, goes for the cut, and it squeezes through to Boucher who breaks the stumps .. Kumble appeals for a catch. Did it take the gloves? There was some deflection
pushes this one through the off side for a single. What a fine start from Kumble.
pushed away for a single
sprays it just outside leg stump, perhaps he thought Hayden would move down the leg side but Hayden stays where he was and plays the leg glance
Mon goosebumps time! He crashes the full delivery to long-off boundary.
Whack! Kallis drags it short and Hayden plays the pull shot to perfection.
from round the stumps now, he slips in a slower one, Hayden walks down the track, goes for the big lofted hit but is beaten by the change of pace
fires a bouncer around off stump line, Hayden sways away from the line
Nice googly. BAiley is clueless. Slow looped up, outside off stump and Bailey pushes out and gets an inside edge on to the pad
this one has been pushed back to the bowler
byes, flighted on middle and leg line, Bailey doesn't connect with the sweep shot but the ball goes off the pads to fine-leg boundary
googly, this time worked past square-leg
full loopy delivery on middle stump line, driven to long-on
this one is a leg break, turns away from Bailey who stabs it to backward point
FOUR, short in length on the middle and leg, Bailey shuffles inside the line and goes for the pull and ends up dragging it down to fine-leg boundary

**Hayden is run out. Direct hit from Rahul Dravid** It was pushed to cover, Hayden backed up too far, Dravid swooped in for the kill and under-armed a direct hit at the non-striker's end . Huge moment this! Dravid has struck a big blow!
runs, Banged in short and Bailey top edges the pull shot between long leg and deep square-leg

Two wickets in Vinay's over. A run out and now Bailey's wicket. A lovely leg cutter, around the off stump and Bailey edges the off drive. Vinay turns and appeals. Tiffin tells him to look back,. the batsman is walking. Very good ball from Vinay. In the last year's IPl, he removed Tendulkar with a fine leg cutter. He has now ended Bailey's misery
run, pushed to point for a single

run, Vinay produces a fine bouncer and Raina, who struggles against the short-pitched stuff, takes his eyes off the ball and fends it off in an ungainly fashion.. the ball lobbed in the air but went clear of square-leg fielder
**run out chance missed** stays back to push the short of length delivery to backward point. Vijay rushes back to get inside the crease .. the throw is just wide of the crease
stays back to clip it past square-leg
stays back to wrist the back-of-length delivery on middle stump to backward square-leg region
short delivery, swatted past square-leg
another bouncer, climbs shoulder high and it flies past the attempted pull
in the zone outside off stump, Vijay pressed back to push out at it and is beaten
SIX, A brutal pull from Raina! This time around, he seemed to anticipate the short delivery from Vinay and got into a nice position to pull it away over square-leg boundary
run, And Vinay comes back with a quicker bouncer and this time, Raina is beaten by the extra bounce .. the ball flies past his face
wide, tries to slip in the slower one but slips it wide outside off stump
Vinay strikes again! Raina goes for a slog across the line, to a length delivery that pitched outside off stump and moving further away, and ends up edging it to Kallis at wide third man
run, stays behind the line to clip it past square-leg
run, length delivery around off stump and Badri leans forward to push it to the off side.
run, full in length and outside off, run down to Manish at third man
nice full delivery that dips rapidly on Badrinath who works it past square-leg
The slider .. Vijay is struck on the pad .... shout for lbw ...perhaps missing the leg stump ..
goes for the slog sweep but this time Kumble bowled the leg break outside off and in trying to fetch it from there, Vijay miscues the shot to deep midwicket.
steps forward, reaches the pitch of the leg break and lofts it over the non-striker's head
quickly skidding slider on the off and middle, jabbed away to short third man ..
googly on the middle and off line, tapped to the on side for a single
short in length, 147.3 kmph, it cuts in to brush the thigh pad and goes to BOucher.
147.4 kmph delivery on the middle stump line, edged behind square-leg.
147,.7 short-of-length delivery outside off stump, Badrinath leaned back to cut it between the keeper and the wide slip! Cry of agony from Steyn

Manish makes a mess at third man boundary and both Kumble and Steyn look very angry. It was upper cut by Badri and Manish lets the ball slip through his fingers. Not a catch... it was rolling towards him. Steyn screams, Kumble stares.
ooh! Steyn takes out his anger on the batsman. .. a pacy bouncer and Badri goes down under
another short delivery , Badrinath seemed to be expecting it, backed away to the on side and tried to upper cut it over slips but can't connect
slower one, full and outside off, hit to sweeper cover
almost yorker length, dug out to the off side
137 kmph bouncer on the middle, Badri top-edges the attempted hook to fine-leg boundary. Kallis isn't too pleased!
length delivery around off stump line, mistimes the punchy shot to short mid-off region
moves outside leg, Kallis a bouncer outside off, Albie tries to reach out and upper cut but no wood on leather
backs outside leg again. Kallis cuts the ball from middle and leg line, from short of length and the ball flies over the middle stump
SIX, Top shot. Badri walked outside off stump, opened up his stance and pulled it to backward square-leg boundary
run, full delivery, Badri prefers to stay back and works it to long leg
run, goes for the slog across the line but doesn't connect properly, edged to his pad
run, moves outside leg and goes for the big shot through the off side but the ball rushes past him and to the keeper
FOUR, Whack! Like he did in the first ball, he moves to the off side and plays a crunchy pull shot

Badri too is gone. He actually played a quite decent shot but he has found the fielder. He threatened to move outside leg before he pressed right across the stumps and scooped the low full toss to deep backward square-leg region where the Appanna, the sub for Uthappa who had a ice pack on his shoulder after his innings, was stationed.
full and well outside off stump, .. left alone
another bouncer, another top-edged pull shot ,.. Manish rushes in from fine-leg but cant' reach the ball
Swing and a miss. Done in by the slower one.
really full delivery well outside off, Morkel reaches out to edge it to point
bye, full delivery on the pads ..
again can't connect well with his swing to the on side.
full and just outside off, run down to third man
short lifting delivery outside off,Albie tries to play a upper cut but is beaten for pace and bounce
moves outside leg and mistimes a forcing shot towards sweeper cover
around the off stump line, pushed to cover point for a single
bounces from short of length, around 148 kmph, on the middle stump line, stabbed away to the off for a single
Ashwin moves outside off stump, the slow bouncer from Steyn, cut away to deep point region
full and outside off, Ashwin was outside leg and in the end couldn't reach the ball
full delivery around off, driven to Appanna at sweeper cover
Fullish, outside off, dragged down to long-on
banged in short, top edges the pull behind the bowler ... Kohli comes from the off side, Dravid runs from midwicket .. neither call and the ball drops in between them!
gets into position and drives through cover .. will collect a boundary. too little and too late
full delivery, squeezed out
FOUR, bouncer around off stump line, Ashwin is late on the pull and top edges it over Boucher
run, moves outside leg and carves a slower one to deep point region
SIX, Albie Morkel, has smashed this right into the roof of the stadium! Hammered that. It was right in the slot and he cleared the front foot and swung through the line
Vinay is pumped up after taking out Albie with a super yorker. He had moved to round the stumps and ripped the ball full and straight on the base of off stump. Crash!
run, in the zone outside off stump, big swing and a miss
run, And again. Bangalore prevail yet again.
